name: 3064x64
description:
3064 x 64 is a combo shmup breakout style game.  Lines of bricks will appear and travel downward. Enemy ships will spawn and try to stop you. Bounce the ball off your ship to try and destroy them. A boss awaits at the end of the level.

Controls

  • ← move left
  • → move right
  • ↑ move up
  • ↓ move down

Avoid enemy bullets. The ball will bounce off the edge of the screen. The player's hotbox is smaller than the ship model. Just protect your cockpit.

Art by Brian Deysher. Programmed by Phil Germano.
